properties.entry: select C_NO, C_TITLE, C_CONTENTS, C_DATE, a.StaTUS, C_STAR, COUNT, b.USER_Name, C_CATEGORY from cook_board a join member b on (a.user_no = b.user_no) where C_CATEGORY =
select c_no, c_title, c_contents, c_date, a.status, c_star, count , a.user_no, c_category, b.user_name from Cook_board a join member b on a.user_no = b.user_no where c_no = ?
select file_no, origin_name, change_name, file_path, file_level, c_no from attechment where c_no = ?
update cook_board set status='N' where c_no = ?
